attributes.action: Keep Olympics Stadium for athletics/entertainment not football
attributes.additional_details:
The Olympics stadium should be used for athletics and entertainment for the WHOLE country and NOT pulled to bits by a football club to satisfy just their supporters.
This stadium should be a lergacy for the WHOLE country not just one London football club!
I'm sure it could be used for concerts as well as athletics e.g. there must be many big bands who would love to say "I/We played the Olympic Stadium!"
